summary: A new set of meshes and textures for the interior of azuras star.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10]Alternative Azuras Crystals [/size]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a1UFD99l.jpg[/IMG]

[size=2]By Aiyen [/size]

[size=5]Description: [/size]
A rather simple retexture and remodel of the crystals inside of azuras star. I have been told there is a sort of quest to go there and fight bad mages n stuff! Sounds fun but I was more concerned with making crystals.

I did not really like the vanilla concept... So I made my own. I have provided shots with and without ENB in the image section! Do note that how it will look with ENB depends on the preset! The images here are made with Skylight ENB.

If you want to see how they look with your game quickly then from the main menu open the console and type
coc azurasstarinterior01

This will bring you right on in for quick testing.


[size=5]Installation: [/size]
It is simple textures and meshes use your mod manager to install and remove like normal. Folder structure should be correct!

Credits:
Bethesda for the game and all the goodies to play with!


Permissions:
If you want to use these assets in your own mod, please ask me first! I will most likely agree it is the best idea since sliced bread!
I do not give permission for these assets to be redistributed to other sites then the Nexus.
author: Aiyen
